intro: Cynoglossum hybridum, commonly known as forget-me-not, is a flowering plant belonging to the Boraginaceae family. It is characterized by its blue or violet flowers, which are typically arranged in clusters and bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant has oval, velvety leaves that are often hairy to the touch. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in meadows, woodlands, and along stream banks. Cynoglossum hybridum is valued for its ornamental appeal and is also used in traditional herbal medicine.
